title: Judge Denise Cote issues preliminary injunction restricting DOGE access to OPM records
summary: Court finds privacy and cybersecurity laws violated in granting DOGE affiliates access to OPM systems; limits further access pending litigation.

sources.title: Judge grants preliminary injunction challenging DOGE-OPM record access
Judge finds OPM broke law in granting data access to DOGE
Judge restricts DOGE access to OPM systems
